org.grails.datastore.mapping.jpa.config
[Java] Class JpaMappingFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.datastore.mapping.model.MappingFactory
      org.grails.datastore.mapping.jpa.config.JpaMappingFactory

@SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes", "unchecked"})
public class JpaMappingFactory
extends org.grails.datastore.mapping.model.MappingFactory

MappingFactory for JPA that maps entities to javax.persistence.Table instances and properties to javax.persistence.Column instances.

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
Since:
1.0
